subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Flyers beat the Pittsburgh Penguins for a 3-0 lead in an Eastern Conference quarterfinal, and baseball players wore No. 42 in tribute to Jackie Robinson.
snippet: The Philadelphia Flyers beat the Pittsburgh Penguins for a 3-0 lead in an Eastern Conference quarterfinal, and baseball players wore No. 42 in tribute to Jackie Robinson.
